infos.value: Welcome home, Papas!
How've you been, Nador?
Good! I've been praying with everyone in the village. I didn't miss a single day!
Is that so? How nice.
You'll be able to get by just fine with this, won't you?
Thank you, Papa. But...
Can't I live with you yet?
Your papas are real busy at work, aye.
I see...
Oh, also!
My friend told me that normally, there's only one papa in a family.
So why do I have two?
Um... Th-that's...
All right, lad. Listen up.
You like apples, right?
Yeah, I love them!
Okay, then. So would you rather have one apple or two?
Two, duh!
Then it's the same with papas. Two is better than one, don't you think?
That's right!
Now, then... What about the stone box?
Don't worry. I haven't shown anybody.
Have you...opened it?
Nope. You told me I'm not allowed to open it, so I haven't.
That's right. What a good boy you are.
All right, your papas have to get going.
Come back soon, okay? May the Crystals watch over you.
We have to keep trying. Not just for us, but for the lad, too.
Right you are, Brother.
Well, what a surprise this is. Congratulations, "papas."
Wh-what are you going on about?
I told you to wait over there, aye?
I got bored.
Zazan is getting testy as well. He's been talking about laying waste to this village.
S-stop that! Don't lay a hand on any of these people!
...Wow. Quite out of character today, aren't we?
Shut your mouth. Let's get going.
To where, exactly?
Robb's men somehow made quick work of the Sanctum monks.
There's no one left alive who knows that we ditched the battle.
There's nothing stopping us from swinging open the Cathedral doors and returning to Sadali's side, aye?
Those three... Can we just kill them already?
This is the perfect opportunity. But alas...
We're too close to the village. We don't want to drag innocents into this.
Then how about we trail them a little while longer?
Sounds good to me.
...What's wrong, Brother?
He said something about a stone box. Can't say I'm not curious about what might be inside...
